desktopView

Class DesktopCanvas

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • desktopView.DesktopCanvas
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDesktopCanvas, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants, ImgCanvas

    public class DesktopCanvas
extends javax.swing.JFrame
implements IDesktopCanvas
    Holds all of the code intended for a desktop view ala Java 1.7. Should be used only when images from the parent package are being used.
    Version:
    1.2
    Author:
    Brian Nakayama
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • TOP_SPACE

        public static final int TOP_SPACE

        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • DesktopCanvas

        public DesktopCanvas(int width,
             int height,
             java.lang.String title)
        Basic Desktop view for the game. Full Screen mode will try to change the screen's resolution by default.
        Parameters:
        width - The width (in pixels) of the screen.
        height - The height (in pixels) of the screen.
        title - The title (for windowed mode).

      • DesktopCanvas

        public DesktopCanvas(int width,
             int height,
             java.lang.String title,
             boolean virtual)
        Desktop View for the game. Modify the fullscreen mode from here.
        Parameters:
        width - The width (in pixels) of the screen.
        height - The height (in pixels) of the screen.
        title - The title (for windowed mode).
        virtual - true to stretch to approximate the games pixels without changing the resolution.
